thread.title: Mavenspire, Inc. Named a 2015 Inc. 5000 Honoree
thread.title_full: Mavenspire, Inc. Named a 2015 Inc. 5000 Honoree - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: Mavenspire, Inc. Named a 2015 Inc. 5000 Honoree
text:
Mavenspire, Inc. Named a 2015 Inc. 5000 Honoree
Annapolis, MD, October 16, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Mavenspire has been named to the 2015 Inc. 5000 list of the fastest growing private companies in America. Its growth over the last 4 years earned the company the solid position of 2637 out of 5000, representing a growth rate of 140%. With inclusion in the Inc. 5000, Mavenspire joins the ranks of other notable Maryland businesses such as Greensmith, Edifice Solutions and CG Phones.
Mavenspire attributes its success to remaining agile and capitalizing on every opportunity in a constantly changing technology landscape. Mavenspire President and CEO, Michael Tanenhaus, states about the upcoming year, “I am aware that we have far outstripped that performance for 2015. I fully expect that we will have those same awards moving up in position in the next year’s announcements as well. I do not see any change in our trajectory.”
Mavenspire Inc. is a leading IT consulting firm in the MidAtlantic for designing and implementing enterprise datacenter solutions, and partners with leading solution providers such as Dell, Silver Peak, Microsoft, and Nexenta.
Mavenspire, Inc.
www.Mavenspire.com
More information about the 2015 Inc. 5000 list can be found at http://www.inc.com/profile/mavenspire .
About Mavenspire: Mavenspire’s experienced team provides data center solutions to large enterprises and mid-sized businesses all over the world. Our proven process combines expert assessment, architecture, design and implementation with the best-in-class data center solutions available today. We work with you to understand your goals, solve the tough problems and create a plan for your desired outcomes. Our goal is to be your partner every step of the way and inspire the future of your business. Learn more at http://www.mavenspire.com/ . ‘Like’ us on Facebook, ‘follow’ on Twitter and ‘follow’ on LinkedIn for the latest events and technology news.
